title: Megumi to Taiyou: Kajuu Gummi Tweet Love Story
synopsis: The "Megumi and Taiyou" commercial depicts the reunion of a girl named Megumi (Ai Hashimoto), who was raised near a grape orchard, and her childhood friend Taiyou (Sakuma Kazuyuki).
related_anime: ['Megumi to Taiyou II: Kajuu Gummi Tweet Mystery - Kieta Sapphire Roman no Nazo', 'Choco Kyouju no Oheya']
